tldr: Affected versions of the `@algolia/autocomplete-plugin-algolia-insights` library are vulnerable to improper authentication. In some cases, user tokens can be accidentally updated when authenticated user tokens are already set, potentially allowing unauthorized access.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@algolia/autocomplete-plugin-algolia-insights` library to the patch version.
